pr_title: Add travis-retry to check-links & compatibility check tasks

timeline.message:
Add travis-retry to check-links build task

The check-links task sees random failures pretty frequently
This update adds 'travis-retry' which will automatically
retry up to 3 times.

Retry documentation is at:
https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/#travis_retry
Add travis retry to compatibility checks in case we get a failure downloading an XML

timeline.bodyText: AFAIK "skip" is just a placeholder term to skip the install task, so it doesn't make sense to keep it here
timeline.author: RoiEXLab
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ sudo: false
 language: java
 jdk: openjdk11
 cache: { directories: [ ".gradle", "~/.gradle/caches" ] }
-install: skip
+install: skip travis_retry

replies.bodyText: +From the documentation it seems that this is a built-in command no need to run it inside the install step
replies.author: RoiEXLab

replies.bodyText:
True enough @RoiEXLab
I must have been tired or something when doing this, I was thinking this was a list of dependencies to install and that 'skip' was one of them somewhere..  😁
Yeah, 'install' block is a script to run, makes sense for this to have error'ed out.
replies.author: DanVanAtta
